snippet: Pope Francis is taking action in a divisive diocese in Paraguay where an Argentine priest, accused by a former superior of being a "serious threat to young people," has been removed as the No. 2....

headline.print_headline: Vatican Taking Action in Divisive Paraguay Diocese
headline.main: Vatican Taking Action in Divisive Paraguay Diocese

lead_paragraph: Pope Francis is taking action in a divisive diocese in Paraguay where an Argentine priest, accused by a former superior of being a "serious threat to young people," has been removed as the No. 2.
